title: Spark - A Bedtime Rhyming Picture Book
description: Spark is a bedtime rhyming picture book for children. Children will enjoy the rhyming rhythm, and the funny color illustrations will make them giggle with delight. Every child is afraid of the dark, but not with Spark. Spark is a nightlight that keeps things nice and bright.“No monsters, no worry. No creepers in a hurry.No snakes. No Spiders.No Skeleton bike riders.”What other things will Spark keep out at night? There is only one way to find out! You and your children will have to read every single page! Sure to become a classic!
author: Mark      Smith
